title: Multi-Agent Interaction Design to Enhance Collective Efficacy in Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Conducted as a short-term intensive workshop within a graduate language curriculum, combining online collaborative platforms with offline discussions in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three communication strategies for enhancing collective efficacy in a multi-agent interaction environment
Learners achieve over 80% participation rates through collective knowledge-building activities during online collaboration
Learners can diagnose their collaboration patterns and propose improvement strategies using network analysis techniques
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
